page.title: 01MEONSTOKE,EXTON,CORHAMPTON
page.content: The villages of Meonstoke, Exton and Corhampton are situated in the downlands of Mid-Hampshire beside the River Meon.Meonstoke and Corhampton lie together on one side of the river with Exton on the other.The villages are surrounded by farmland and overlooked by Old Winchester Hill and Beacon Hill.The area is bisected north/south by the A.32 road and the river. The villages have a population of around 900.Apart from the farm workers most of the working population travel to Winchester(10miles) Southampton(15m) Portsmouth (13m)or Fareham(8m). Considering the rural situation there is a wide age range and cross section of employments.
